Control Store Selection R Code:

*git/invent-library/ControlStoreSelectionMain_Glmnet.R*Aim:

Predicting monthly sales of the selected stores using other stores’ monthly data. In order to predict the selected stores’ sales revenue each selected store is taken one by one and a penalized regression model is created.

Parameters: fit<-cv.glmnet(x, y[,i], type.measure="mse", alpha=(0.85))

type.measure=the error type used while creating the model

alpha=coefficient penalty parameter, alpha=1 is lasso, alpha=0 is ridge. Decreasing alpha increases the coefficients used in the model.

Input Files:Your input data should be in these formats:

-Selected Store Codes ("SelectedTestStores.csv")

| StoreCode |
| --- |
| 00001 |
| 00028 |
| 01616 |

-Monthly Sales of All Stores Data (StoreMonthlySales_v2.rds)

| StoreCode | Year | Month | SalesRevenue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 00028 | 2016 | 5 | 5130 |
| 00028 | 2017 | 5 | 6028 |
| 04586 | 2016 | 8 | 3659 |

-- | --- | --- |
| 00028 | 2016 | 5 | 5130 |
| 00028 | 2017 | 5 | 6028 |
| 04586 | 2016 | 8 | 3659 |

-Region Data (optional-used for analyses) (Stores_FLNA_Regions.csv)

| StoreCode | StoreDescription | Region |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 5299 | ORLANDO FL | SOUTHEAST |
| 5292 | RALEIGH (E), NC | CAROLINAS |
| 1253 | AUSTIN (S) TX | TEXOMA |

-Transformed Format

The input format is transformed into this structure, the column names are the stores.

| Time | 00023 | 00029 | 00030 | 00032 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 3 | 6816 | 3685 | 3262 | 1421 |
| 4 | 8105 | 4859 | 4068 | 1522 |
| 5 | 6062 | 3626 | 3180 | 1400 |
| 6 | 5706 | 3531 | 3165 | 1921 |
| 7 | 7273 | 4186 | 3920 | 2544 |
| 8 | 5656 | 3565 | 3065 | 1518 |
| 9 | 5583 | 3542 | 3171 | 1075 |

Outputs:Store Based Error Plot:

Plot of the store-based errors in an increasing order. Store info can be reached from data table “d”

plot(d$SelectedStoreErrors)

Monthly Total Errors Bar Plot:

info can be reached from data table “d”

plot(d$SelectedStoreErrors)

Monthly Total Errors Bar Plot:

The prediction error is calculated an plotted monthly for the selected stores.

barplot(MonPercErr,names.arg = NamesMonth)

Total Forecast Error:

TotalsMpe - The total forecast error of the selected stores’ total revenue

> TotalsMpe #((sum of selected store actual values)-(sum of predictions))/(sum of selected store actual values)

[1] -0.004802935Store Based Errors:

mape – Store specific forecast error

> mape      # mean absolute percent error for each store-month

[1] 0.07310312Average Number of Coefficients:

AvgCoefNo – Average number of predictor stores used in the models while predicting the selected stores

> AvgCoefNo # average number of predictor stores selected by the model

[1] 13.17115Coefficients of the Control Stores:

StoreListCoeff - For each test store, coefficients of the predictor stores (control stores) are held in this table.

NOTES:

ch test store, coefficients of the predictor stores (control stores) are held in this table.

NOTES:

-Regional sums and chain sums are only included for the analyses at the current version of the code. These can be further improvements.

-If you do not provide region info the code will work but regional analysis parts may result with errors.

-The code: ControlStoreSelectionPerformanceCheck_Glmnet-Lasso-FwStagewise Performance Comparison.R compares the performances of Glmnet, lasso and forwards stagewise models. You can compare them if you want to try new models.
